means: methylisobutylxanthine 甲基异丁基黄嘌呤

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"混合"之意。
means: mix ： 含义广泛，侧重混合的一致性，混合的各成分可能按原样存在，但不一定能辨别出来。
mingle ： 暗示混合后的各成分仍保持各自的特性，能辨别出来。
blend ： 一般可与mix和mingle换用。混合与其各成分的性质通常是一致的，侧重混合整体的统一性与和谐性。
combine ： 通常用于化学反应中，指化合物等。
merge ： 指一种成分被别一种成分吸收或融合，着重成分的个性消失在整体之中。

word_mean: 另煎或烊化所取药汁，冲入其他药物煎出液后同服的方法。

sentence.Network_en: To save time we used packets of pizza dough mix.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了节约时间，我们用了几包做比萨饼的混合面粉。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: back-formation from mixed (taken as a past participle)

encyclopedia.content: 成立背景 2002年初，在北京娱乐市场上鲜有的以HIP-POP,R&B等音乐为主的俱乐部的情况下，CLUB MIX投资者以独到的眼光将酒吧与酒吧文化进行了极富思想意义的延展，以HIP-POP.R&B音乐为主流风格的同时加入流行等音乐元素，打入消费市场服务大众，成为独具慧眼认识选择的个性活动场所，以及商业活动中理想的合作伙伴。MIX酒吧介绍 Mix 京城夜店第一家 HIP-HOP热舞圣地 Club Mix位于北京朝阳区工人体育场北门内西侧， HIP-HOP

entry.def: If two substances mix or if you mix one substance with another, you stir or shake them together, or combine them in some other way, so that they become a single substance.

example.ex: It mixes easily with cold or hot water to make a tasty, filling drink...
example.tran: 它极易溶于冷水或热水，冲成既可口又充饥的饮料。

entry.def: If you mix something, you prepare it by mixing other things together.

example.ex: He had spent several hours mixing cement...
example.tran: 他花了几个小时搅拌水泥。

example.ex: Are you sure I can't mix you a drink?
example.tran: 你确定不用我为你调一杯饮料吗？

entry.tran: (制作糕点、调味汁等的)混合原料，混合配料
entry.def: A mix is a powder containing all the substances that you need in order to make something such as a cake or a sauce. When you want to use it, you add liquid.

example.ex: For speed we used packets of pizza dough mix...
example.tran: 为了节约时间，我们用了几包做比萨饼的混合面粉。

entry.def: A mix of different things or people is two or more of them together.

example.ex: The story is a magical mix of fantasy and reality...
example.tran: 这个故事是幻想与现实的奇妙结合。

example.ex: We get a very representative mix of people.
example.tran: 我们现在有了非常具有代表性的一群人。

entry.def: If two things or activities do not mix or if one thing does not mix with another, it is not a good idea to have them or do them together, because the result would be unpleasant or dangerous.

example.tran: 政治与体育不可混为一谈。

example.ex: ...some of these pills that don't mix with drink...
example.tran: 一些不能用饮料冲服的药片

entry.def: If you mix with other people, you meet them and talk to them. You can also say that people mix .

example.ex: I ventured the idea that the secret of staying young was to mix with older people...
example.tran: 我大胆地提出了这样的观点：保持年轻的秘诀就在于和年长的人交往。

example.ex: People are supposed to mix, do you understand?...
example.tran: 人们应该互相交际，你明白吗？

entry.def: When a record producer mixes a piece of music, he or she puts together the various sounds that have been recorded in order to make the finished record.

example.ex: They've been mixing tracks for a new album due out later this year.
example.tran: 他们一直在为定于今年稍后推出的新专辑录制歌曲。

entry.tran: 经常大吵大闹，动不动就大打出手(美国英语用 mix it up)
entry.def: If you say that someone mixes it, or in American English mixes it up, you mean that they often fight or argue strongly about things.

example.ex: Stewart has developed a tendency to mix it verbally with the opposition.
example.tran: 斯图尔特现在变得只要和别人意见不合，就准备大吵一架。

means.word_mean: 2. open (a place) to members of all races and ethnic groups;
3. to bring or combine together or with something else;
5. add as an additional element or part;
6. mix so as to make a random order or arrangement;

sentences.en: He was preparing fodder, chopping finely and mixing thoroughly.
sentences.cn: 他在准备饲料, 把它切碎, 拌好。

sentences.en: You can mix blue and yellow paint to make green one.
sentences.cn: 你可以把蓝色和黄色油漆混合成绿色。

sentences.en: His first reaction was a strange mix of joy and anger.
sentences.cn: 他的第一反应很奇怪, 高兴和愤怒掺杂在一起。

sentences.en: Cake is made from a packaged mix.
sentences.cn: 糕点是由一包现成的配料制成的。

jushi.chinese: 他在准备饲料,把它切碎,拌好。

jushi.english: People from different classes used to mix very little.
jushi.chinese: 不同阶层的人过去很少交往。
